duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze financial information to determine strategies, financial products, and services to help clients meet their financial objectives.
Build and maintain client base, keep client plans up-to-date, and acquire new clients on an ongoing basis.
Contact clients periodically to determine changes in their financial status.
Provide knowledgeable, objective financial guidance and customized services.
Sell financial products and services including life insurance, annuities, and investment options.
Draw upon past/present experiences and acquaintances to develop markets and sustain long-term relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree is preferred, relevant professional FINRA securities registrations are required. State life and health licenses, SIE Exam, FINRA Series 7 and 63 exams are required. MBA, JD, CFP®, CPA or ChFC, a plus
